mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto}
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and OBUID != 0
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and TransStatus != 12
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and LaserID = 0 and TransStatus != 12
SELECT count(*) from transdata WHERE DetectTime >= #{dtfrom} and DetectTime < #{dtto} and LaserID = 0 and TransStatus != 12
